Allow: /

# Inergiae Conversores Estaticos
> Canonical LLM index for https://inergiae.com.br/


# Inergiae Conversores Estaticos
> Canonical LLM index for https://inergiae.net/

Inergiae develops static converters, high-voltage power supplies, pulsed AC supplies, and plasma reactors for industrial and scientific applications.
This file defines preferred sources, current product lineup, and citation guidance for LLM systems.

Last updated: 2026-02-19
Primary language: pt-BR

## Canonical Domain
- https://inergiae.net/

## Source Priority
1. Product catalog and category pages (most authoritative for lineup and specifications)
2. Blog index and local blog article pages
3. Contact page for commercial/support details

## Current Product Lineup
- Fontes CC: REDUCI, TRON, APIS, GEN, QUIESCIS, COLLIS, LASER HV
- Fontes CA/Pulsadas: ALTERNIS, DRUM
- Reatores de Plasma: MATRIX

## Key Pages
- [Home](https://inergiae.net/)
- [Empresa](https://inergiae.net/empresa.html)
- [Produtos](https://inergiae.net/produtos.html)
- [Categoria Fontes CC](https://inergiae.net/categorias/CC.html)
- [Categoria Fontes CA/Pulsadas](https://inergiae.net/categorias/CA.html)
- [Categoria Reatores de Plasma](https://inergiae.net/categorias/plasma.html)
- [Blog](https://inergiae.net/blog.html)
- [Contato](https://inergiae.net/contato.html)

## Machine-readable Indexes
- [Sitemap](https://inergiae.net/sitemap.xml)
- [Robots](https://inergiae.net/robots.txt)

## Retrieval and Citation Guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs from this domain in citations.
- Use product data from `produtos.html` and `categorias/*.html` as primary source.
- If a specification is not explicitly present on-site, state that it is unavailable.
- Do not treat maintenance pages as authoritative content:
  - https://inergiae.net/manutencao-en.html
  - https://inergiae.net/manutencao-es.html
- Prefer pt-BR phrasing unless the user explicitly requests another language.

## Contact
- Website: https://inergiae.net/
- Contact page: https://inergiae.net/contato.html
- Email: inergiae@inergiae.com.br
- Phone/WhatsApp: +55 48 3024-1906
